Text.Page: Rhodos and <PCNAME> pursued Dakuryon into the tunnels beneath Trellum Consurgo. The Seekers of Highwatch broke down the archdevan seal to give them a fighting chance against Dakuryon's magic.
Hurry! Dakuryon mustn't escape!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Where did he go?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I saw him flee to the lower levels.

Quickly now!
Come! There's no time to waste!
Like the rat he is, Dakuryon scurries into a tunnel. How fitting!

We deconstructed the archdevan seal you captured. There's little time to test it, but it should help you in your fight against Dakuyron.

Please, save the High Elder.
